# The Building Coder - Complete Archive

> Jeremy Tammik's Revit API Blog - Optimized for AI Retrieval

Complete archive of 2764 blog posts covering Revit API development from 2008-2025.

## Quick Start - Essential Reading

- [Welcome](https://buzzytrent90.github.io/tbc_blog_md/0001_welcome.md)

- [Managing SDK Samples](https://buzzytrent90.github.io/tbc_blog_md/0005_managing_sdk_samples.md)

- [Loading SDK Samples](https://buzzytrent90.github.io/tbc_blog_md/0007_loading_sdk_samples.md)
- [Debugging a Revit Add-In](https://buzzytrent90.github.io/tbc_blog_md/0008_debugging.md)
- [What Next?](https://buzzytrent90.github.io/tbc_blog_md/0009_what_next.md)
